alert.note: Alert for Southern Fairfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued July 03 at 3:39PM EDT until July 05 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 2 AM EDT TUESDAY... ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline for the tonight and Monday night high tide cycle. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Southern Fairfield County. In New York, Southern Westchester County. * WHEN...For the first Coastal Flood Statement, from 11 PM this evening to 2 AM EDT Tuesday. For the second Coastal Flood Statement, late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Brief minor flooding of the most vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional rounds of brief minor flooding are possible with the evening high tide cycle through midweek.
